transcript: I'm not a code guy and the mistake that I made when I was building Allen was that I did not have a technical co-founder and so I had an Outsource development team and that was a big mistake I was say hey can we change this button right and then you'd say it takes a month and I'd be like I feel like you can do better than that I had no idea it could have taken two years I have no clue so I'm blind negotiating trying to just keep a front but I have no clue what I'm talking about
